caption: Relating to instruction in human trafficking awareness in public schools.
undersanding:
Summary (English):
This bill mandates human trafficking awareness education in Texas public schools. Students in grades 6-8 must complete a one-semester course, while high school students need a half-credit course. The curriculum covers trafficking causes, prevention, online safety, and victim support. This law applies to all students regardless of nationality, including Chinese students in Texas public schools.

中文总结：
该法案要求德克萨斯州公立学校开设人口贩运意识教育课程。6-8年级学生必须完成一个学期的课程，高中生需要完成半学分课程。课程内容包括人口贩运的原因、预防、网络安全和受害者援助。该法律适用于所有在德州公立学校就读的学生，包括在校的中国学生。
